title: Eclipse with JAVA DEVELOPMENT KIT all portable
description:
I just want to help 
people talk about java portable and how to make it portable
nobody has ever done the full thing and uploaded it 
I've used eclipse(already portable) and made JDK portable and linked the two to be used from a USB flash drive
512 Mb USB minimum
how to use:
1.download from here
2.extract to the root of a USB (H: )for example
3.run eclipse.exe
and ur done
plz comment and seed 
i wanna know if it is 100% portable and if it needs any more tweaks
